recipe.title: Roasted Pepper and Maple Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup coarsely chopped drained bottled roasted red peppers (6 ounces)
1 teaspoon chopped canned chipotle chiles in adobo plus 1 teaspoon adobo sauce (from can), or 1/2 teaspoon cayenne
instructions: Purée all ingredients in a blender until smooth, then simmer in a small heavy saucepan, stirring occasionally, until reduced to about 3/4 cup, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Serve with shrimp or chicken.
